    • Method Detail

      • addUserToGroups

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @POST(value="v3/users/{user_id}/groups")
retrofit2.Call<UpdatedResponse> addUserToGroups(@Path(value="user_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String userId,
                                                                                                                                            @Body
                                                                                                                                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> body)
        Add user to a list of groups. Add user to groups. **Example:** ``` curl -X POST https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/users/{user_id}/groups \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' \\ -d '[\"0162056a9a1586f30242590700000000\",\"0117056a9a1586f30242590700000000\"]' ```
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of the user to add to the group. (required)
        body - A list of IDs of the groups to update. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<UpdatedResponse>

      • createUser

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @POST(value="v3/users")
retrofit2.Call<UserInfoResp> createUser(@Body
                                                                                                                   UserInfoReq body,
                                                                                                                   @Query(value="action")
                                                                                                                   java.lang.String action)
        Create a new user. Create or invite a new user to the account. Only email address is used; other attributes are set in the second step. **Example:** ``` curl -X POST https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/users?action=invite \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' \\ -d {\"email\": \"myemail@company.com\"} ```
        Parameters:
        body - A user object with attributes. (required)
        action - Action, either `create` or `invite`. (optional, default to create)
        Returns:
        Call<UserInfoResp>

      • deleteUser

        @DELETE(value="v3/users/{user_id}")
retrofit2.Call<java.lang.Void> deleteUser(@Path(value="user_id",encoded=true)
                                                                               java.lang.String userId)
        Delete a user. Delete a user. **Example:** ``` curl -X DELETE https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/users/{user_id} \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of the user to delete. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<Void>

      • getAllUsers

        @GET(value="v3/users")
retrofit2.Call<UserInfoRespList> getAllUsers(@Query(value="limit")
                                                                     java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                                     @Query(value="after")
                                                                     java.lang.String after,
                                                                     @Query(value="order")
                                                                     java.lang.String order,
                                                                     @Query(value="include")
                                                                     java.lang.String include,
                                                                     @Query(value="email__eq")
                                                                     java.lang.String emailEq,
                                                                     @Query(value="status__eq")
                                                                     java.lang.String statusEq,
                                                                     @Query(value="status__in")
                                                                     java.lang.String statusIn,
                                                                     @Query(value="status__nin")
                                                                     java.lang.String statusNin,
                                                                     @Query(value="login_profiles__eq")
                                                                     java.lang.String loginProfilesEq)
        Get the details of all users. Retrieve the details of all users. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/users \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        limit - The number of results to return (2-1000). Default 50. (optional, default to 50)
        after - The entity ID to fetch after the given one. (optional)
        order - Record order based on creation time. Acceptable values: ASC, DESC. Default: ASC. (optional, default to ASC)
        include - Comma-separated additional data to return. Currently supported: total_count. (optional)
        emailEq - Filter for email address (optional)
        statusEq - Filter for status, for example, active or reset. (optional)
        statusIn - An optional filter to retrieve users with a specified set of statuses. (optional)
        statusNin - An optional filter to exclude users with a specified set of statuses. (optional)
        loginProfilesEq - An optional filter to retrieve users with a specified login profile. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<UserInfoRespList>

      • getGroupsOfUser

        @GET(value="v3/users/{user_id}/groups")
retrofit2.Call<GroupSummaryList> getGroupsOfUser(@Path(value="user_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                          java.lang.String userId,
                                                                                          @Query(value="limit")
                                                                                          java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                                                          @Query(value="after")
                                                                                          java.lang.String after,
                                                                                          @Query(value="order")
                                                                                          java.lang.String order,
                                                                                          @Query(value="include")
                                                                                          java.lang.String include)
        Get groups of the user. Retrieve groups of the user. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/users/{user_id}/groups \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of the user. (required)
        limit - The number of results to return (2-1000). Default 50. (optional, default to 50)
        after - The entity ID to fetch after the given one. (optional)
        order - Record order based on creation time. Acceptable values: ASC, DESC. Default: ASC. (optional, default to ASC)
        include - Comma-separated additional data to return. Currently supported: total_count. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<GroupSummaryList>

      • getMyUser

        @GET(value="v3/users/me")
retrofit2.Call<UserInfoResp> getMyUser(@Query(value="scratch_codes")
                                                                  java.lang.String scratchCodes,
                                                                  @Query(value="properties")
                                                                  java.lang.String properties,
                                                                  @Query(value="include")
                                                                  java.lang.String include)
        Details of the current user. Retrieve the details of the logged-in user.
        Parameters:
        scratchCodes - Request to regenerate new emergency scratch codes. (optional)
        properties - Request to return account-specific user property values according to the given property name. (optional)
        include - Comma-separated additional data to return. Currently supported: active_sessions. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<UserInfoResp>

        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of the user. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<UserInfoResp>

      • removeUserFromGroups

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @DELETE(value="v3/users/{user_id}/groups")
retrofit2.Call<UpdatedResponse> removeUserFromGroups(@Path(value="user_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String userId,
                                                                                                                                                   @Body
                                                                                                                                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> body)
        Remove user from groups. Remove user from groups. **Example:** ``` curl -X DELETE https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/users/{user_id}/groups \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' \\ -d '[\"0162056a9a1586f30242590700000000\",\"0117056a9a1586f30242590700000000\"]' ```
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of the user to remove from the group. (required)
        body - A list of IDs of the groups to update. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<UpdatedResponse>

        Parameters:
        body - A user object with attributes. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<UserInfoResp>

      • updateUser

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @PUT(value="v3/users/{user_id}")
retrofit2.Call<UserInfoResp> updateUser(@Path(value="user_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                            java.lang.String userId,
                                                                                                                            @Body
                                                                                                                            UserUpdateReq body)
        Update user details. Update user details **Example:** ``` curl -X PUT https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/users/{user_id} \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' \\ -d '{\"username\": \"myusername\"}' ```
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of the user. (required)
        body - A user object with attributes. (required)
